autoplay.title: Autoplay
autoplay.description: Specifies that the video will start playing as soon as it is ready

controls.title: Controls
controls.description: Specifies that video controls should be displayed (such as a play/pause button etc).

height.title: Height
height.description: Sets the height of the video player

loop.title: Loop
loop.description: Specifies that the video will start over again, every time it is finished

muted.title: Muted
muted.description: Specifies that the audio output of the video should be muted

poster.title: Poster
poster.description: Specifies an image to be shown while the video is downloading, or until the user hits the play button

preload.title: Preload
preload.description: Specifies if and how the author thinks the video should be loaded when the page loads

src.title: URL
src.description: Specifies the URL of the video file

width.title: Width
width.description: Sets the width of the video player
